com.team23.weather.gui

Class CurrentForecastPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.team23.weather.gui.CurrentForecastPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocaleObserver, ILocationObserver, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class CurrentForecastPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ILocationObserver, ILocaleObserver
    A CurrentForecastPanel extends JPanel. A CurrentForecastPanel implements the ILocaleObserver interface, to listen for LocaleSettings changes. A CurrentForecastPanel implements the ILocationObserver interface, to listen to Location changes. A CurrentForecastPanel displays the current forecast for a Location.
    Author:
    Andrew Bloch-Hansen, Saquib Mian
    See Also:
    App, ScrollableGui, RefreshAction, ILocaleObserver, ILocationObserver, JPanel, Serialized Form
